posts.post_title: FS T202 Matty freshly graded PSA 5
posts.post_content: Amazing card - newly graded PSA 5 - card is incredibly centered and stunning!  First 1300.  gets it.  Price includes delivery and is net to me (add 3% for PP goods and services)
